org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.slice
Class SliceKWHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.slice.SliceHelper<Slice>
      org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.slice.SliceKWHelper

public class SliceKWHelper
extends SliceHelper<Slice>

A SliceKWHelper is a helper class for the slice-based construction [Detlef Kahler and Thomas Wilke. Complementation, Disambiguation, and Determinization of Buchi Automata Unified. ICALP 2008]. The options SliceVWOptions.isEnhancedGuessing(), SliceVWOptions.isMergeAdjacent(), SliceKWOptions.isCompleteTransition(), and SliceKWOptions.isEnhancedCutPoint() are taken care in this class.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
